definition: (phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: I was continually getting up and going to the bathroom to refill my glass.
sentences.chinese: 我频繁起来去洗手间，把我的玻璃杯灌满水。

sentences.english: The decanter and the glass were completely empty.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃瓶和玻璃杯都已完全空了。

sentences.english: Shake and strain into a rocks glass, add 7up, stir.
sentences.chinese: 加冰摇合原料滤入冰过的玻璃杯，注入七喜，搅合。

sentences.english: The girt poured a glass of milk for her mother.
sentences.chinese: 女孩给母亲倒了一玻璃杯牛奶。

sentences.english: A minute examination revealed fingerprints on a glass.
sentences.chinese: 经详细检查后发现一只玻璃杯上留有指纹印。

sentences.english: Joe clinked his spoon against his glass as everyone took their seats.
sentences.chinese: 当大家就座时，乔用调羹敲了敲玻璃杯。

sentences.english: Strategy: By doing campaign in Beijing and give out the glasses.
sentences.chinese: 北京各处举办宣传活动，并派发特出的玻璃杯。

sentences.english: There is a drop of water on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有一个玻璃杯水。

sentences.english: There are many different styles of compost tumblers .
sentences.chinese: 有许多不同风格的玻璃杯堆肥。

sentences.english: Add a few drops to half a tumbler of water.
sentences.chinese: 在半玻璃杯水里面加上几滴。

sentences.english: Pour into a long glass, garnishing with a banana and serve.
sentences.chinese: 倒入长玻璃杯，用一片香蕉装饰即可饮用。

sentences.english: Shake with ice and pour into a glass. Fill up with Champagne.
sentences.chinese: 加冰块摇合原料，滤入冰过的玻璃杯，注满香槟。

sentences.english: Take care not to drop the glass.
sentences.chinese: 小心，别把玻璃杯弄掉了。

sentences.english: Seeing the glass half full, it turns out, may yield both mental and physical benefits.
sentences.chinese: 看到玻璃杯里的水满了一半，那就代表着你身心愉悦。

sentences.english: The glasses in the box are fragile.
sentences.chinese: 箱子里的玻璃杯是易碎品。

sentences.english: Add one dash of BOLS Bitter Orange. Shake with ice and strain.
sentences.chinese: 加少量波士橘子苦酒，加冰块摇合，滤入玻璃杯。

definition: thermos bottle/vacuum bottle/hot water dispenser (appliance)/CL:個|个[ge4]
